Privacy Policy

Last updated: 2025-06-14

Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you:

  • Request a quote or book our services
  • Contact us through our website or phone
  • Subscribe to our communications
  • Provide feedback or reviews

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide and improve our pressure washing services
  • Respond to your inquiries and requests
  • Schedule appointments and provide quotes
  • Send you service updates and promotional materials
  • Comply with legal obligations

Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.

Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • Phone: (365) 880-8272
  • Email: thomaschan@stcatharinespressurewashing.ca
  • Address: Niagara Region, Ontario
